EnableViewmodelHands.title: Enable Viewmodel Hands
EnableViewmodelHands.tooltip: Adds a hand model to every item and tool when you hold them! Recommended: Enabled

EnableCameraBob.title: Enable Camera Bobbing
EnableCameraBob.tooltip: Makes the camera bob while you're moving.

CameraBobStrength.title: Camera Bob Strength
CameraBobStrength.tooltip: The scale of the camera's bobbing.

EnableToolBob.title: Enable Tool Bobbing
EnableToolBob.tooltip: Makes the item you're holding bob while you're moving.

ToolBobStrength.title: Tool Bob Strength
ToolBobStrength.tooltip: The scale of the tool's bobbing.

EnableDynamicToolPos.title: Enable Dynamic Tool Position
EnableDynamicToolPos.tooltip: Makes the held tool move based on how far up/down you're looking.

DynamicToolPosStrength.title: Dynamic Tool Position Strength
DynamicToolPosStrength.tooltip: The scale of the tool's movement.

EnableToolSway.title: Enable Tool Sway
EnableToolSway.tooltip: When enabled, the tool will lag behind the camera as you look around.

ToolSwayStrength.title: Tool Sway Strength
ToolSwayStrength.tooltip: The scale of the tool's movement.

TweakItemPos.title: Tweak Held Item Positions
TweakItemPos.tooltip: Tweaks the position of some held items to prevent visual bugs such as items clipping through the camera. Recommended: Enabled

EnableScoutAnim.title: Enable Scout Launcher Fire Animation
EnableScoutAnim.tooltip: Makes the camera and scout launcher recoil when you launch a scout.

UseJumpAnim.title: Use Jumping Animation
UseJumpAnim.tooltip: Makes the camera shake a bit when you jump, based on the view/tool bob amounts you set above. Recommended: Enabled

UseFallAnim.title: Use Falling Animation
UseFallAnim.tooltip: Makes the camera sway a bit as you fall, based on the view/tool bob amounts you set above. Recommended: Enabled

UseLandingAnim.title: Use Landing Animation
UseLandingAnim.tooltip: Makes the camera shake a bit when you land on the ground, based on the view/tool bob amounts you set above. Recommended: Enabled
